SELECT /* ConfirmLoadingForRORO.getInDirectUnitItems */ R.VSL_CALL_ID, R.VSL_CD, R.CALL_YEAR, R.CALL_SEQ, R.MF_DOC_ID, R.CG_NO, R.CHASSIS_NO, R.BRAND_CD, R.MODEL_CD,
R.DRIVER_ID, R.DRIVER_NM, R.DRIVER_LICENSE, ISNULL(R.TRUCK_NO, '') AS TRUCK_NO, R.LOC_ID,
FORMAT(R.GATE_IN_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy mm:hh') AS GATE_IN_DTM, FORMAT(R.IN_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy mm:hh') AS IN_DTM, FORMAT(R.OUT_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy mm:hh') AS OUT_DTM, FORMAT(R.LOADING_DTM, 'dd/MM/yyyy mm:hh') AS LOADING_DTM,
R.DELV_TP_CD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'DELVTP', R.DELV_TP_CD) AS DELV_TP_NM, R.STAT_CD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CGSTATUS', R.STAT_CD) AS STAT_NM, R.STEVEDORE_ID, R.YARD_RMK, R.CRANE, R.LOADING_RMK, R.VSL_LOCATION FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S INNER JOIN TMT_RORO_MST R ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = R.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.CG_NO WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND S.STAT_CD = 'AP' AND S.CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV') AND R.IX_CD = 'X' AND (R.IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R.IN_DTM <> '') AND (R.RHDL_NO IS NULL OR R.RHDL_NO = '')
AND R.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo}
AND R.CHASSIS_NO = #{unitNo}
ORDER BY R.IN_DTM, R.CHASSIS_NO

SELECT 'J' + FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyMMdd') + RIGHT('000000000' + ISNULL(CONCAT(MAX(CAST(RIGHT(JOB_NO, 9) AS INT)) + 1, ''), '000000000'), 9) AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB
INSERT /* ConfirmLoadingForRORO.insertJobItems */ INTO TMT_JOB( VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, WORK_ST_DT, WORK_END_DT, SHFT_ID, PKG_TP_CD, PKG_QTY, CG_VOL, CG_WGT, EQ_NO, TO_LOC_ID, STAT_CD, CG_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, JOB_PURP_CD, DELV_TP_CD, FNL_OPE_YN, FNL_DELV_YN, HATCH_NO, HATCH_DRT, GANG_NO, OPE_CLASS_CD, DMG_YN, SHU_YN, SHFT_DT, JOB_GROUP, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, TSPT_TP_CD, JOB_CO_CD, SP_CA_CO_CD, LORRY_NO, DRIVER_ID, STEVEDORE_ID, GATE_TXN_NO, CHAS_NO ) VALUES ( #{vslCd}, #{callYear}, #{callSeq}, #{mfDocId}, #{jobNo}, #{jobTpCd}, CONVERT(DATETIME, #{startDtStr},103), CONVERT(DATETIME, #{endDtStr},103), DBO.F_GET_SHIFT_CD(CONVERT(DATETIME, #{endDtStr},103), 'CD'), #{pkgTpCd}, #{loadQty}, #{loadM3}, #{loadMt}, #{eqNo}, #{toLocId}, #{statCd}, #{cgNo}, #{vslCallId}, #{jobPurpCd}, #{delvTpCd}, CASE #{fnlOpeYn} WHEN 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN 'Y' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, #{fnlDelvYn}, #{hatchNo}, #{hatchDrt}, #{gangNo}, #{catgCd}, CASE WHEN #{dmgYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{dmgYn} = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'N' END, CASE WHEN #{shuYn} IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'true' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'false' THEN 'N' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'Y' THEN 'Y' WHEN #{shuYn} = 'N' THEN 'N' ELSE 'N' END, CONVERT(DATE, #{shftDt},112), #{jobGroup}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion}, #{tsptTpCd}, #{jobCoCd}, #{spCaCoCd}, #{lorryNo}, #{driverId}, #{stevedoreId}, #{gateTxnNo}, #{unitNo} )

WITH GI_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ,COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_GI FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (GATE_IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND GATE_IN_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ) , HI_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ,COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_HI FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND IN_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ) , YC_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ,COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_YC FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (OUT_DTM IS NOT NULL AND OUT_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ) , D_LC_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ,COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_D_LC FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (LOADING_DTM IS NOT NULL AND LOADING_DTM <> '') AND (IN_DTM IS NULL OR IN_DTM = '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ) , LC_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ,COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_LC FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (LOADING_DTM IS NOT NULL AND LOADING_DTM <> '') GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ) , REHANDLE_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD ,COUNT(CHASSIS_NO) AS NO_OF_REHANDLE FROM TMT_RORO_MST WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND ISNULL(RHDL_NO,'') != '' AND STAT_CD = 'RH' GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID ,MF_DOC_ID ,CG_NO ,IX_CD )
SELECT /* ConfirmLoadingForRORO.selectCargoItemsHHT */ DISTINCT S.VSL_CALL_ID, S.VSL_CD, S.CALL_SEQ, S.CALL_YEAR, R.MF_DOC_ID, R.CG_NO, S.CATG_CD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CATGTP', S.CATG_CD) AS CATG_NM, S.DELV_TP_CD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'DELVTP', S.DELV_TP_CD) AS DELV_TP_NM, S.CG_TP_CD, DBO.F_CM_CODE_NM('MT', 'CGTP', S.CG_TP_CD) AS CG_TP_NM, B.BRAND_CD, B.BRAND_NM, M.MODEL_CD, M.MODEL_NM,
ISNULL(RM.REMAIN_VIN, 0) AS VIN_REMAIN, COUNT(R.CHASSIS_NO) OVER (PARTITION BY R.CG_NO, R.MF_DOC_ID, R.VSL_CALL_ID, R.IX_CD) AS NOS_OF_VIN, ISNULL(G.NO_OF_GI, 0) AS NOS_OF_GI, ISNULL(H.NO_OF_HI, 0) AS NOS_OF_HI, ISNULL(L.NO_OF_LC, 0) AS NOS_OF_LC, ISNULL(H.NO_OF_HI, 0) - ISNULL(Y.NO_OF_YC, 0) - ISNULL(A.NO_OF_REHANDLE, 0) AS TODO_YC, ISNULL(Y.NO_OF_YC, 0) - (ISNULL(L.NO_OF_LC, 0) - ISNULL(D.NO_OF_D_LC, 0)) AS TODO_LC, ISNULL(A.NO_OF_REHANDLE, 0) AS NOS_OF_REHANDLE FROM TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S INNER JOIN TMT_RORO_MST R ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = R.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = R.CG_NO
LEFT OUTER JOIN GI_INFO G ON R.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.MF_DOC_ID = G.MF_DOC_ID AND R.CG_NO = G.CG_NO AND R.IX_CD = G.IX_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN HI_INFO H ON R.VSL_CALL_ID = H.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.MF_DOC_ID = H.MF_DOC_ID AND R.CG_NO = H.CG_NO AND R.IX_CD = H.IX_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN YC_INFO Y ON R.VSL_CALL_ID = Y.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.MF_DOC_ID = Y.MF_DOC_ID AND R.CG_NO = Y.CG_NO AND R.IX_CD = Y.IX_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN D_LC_INFO D ON R.VSL_CALL_ID = D.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.MF_DOC_ID = D.MF_DOC_ID AND R.CG_NO = D.CG_NO AND R.IX_CD = D.IX_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN LC_INFO L ON R.VSL_CALL_ID = L.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.MF_DOC_ID = L.MF_DOC_ID AND R.CG_NO = L.CG_NO AND R.IX_CD = L.IX_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN REHANDLE_INFO A ON R.VSL_CALL_ID = A.VSL_CALL_ID AND R.MF_DOC_ID = A.MF_DOC_ID AND R.CG_NO = A.CG_NO AND R.IX_CD = A.IX_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_BRAND B ON R.BRAND_CD = B.BRAND_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_BRAND_DTL M ON R.MODEL_CD = M.MODEL_CD AND R.BRAND_CD = M.BRAND_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT (R1.CHASSIS_NO) REMAIN_VIN, R1.VSL_CALL_ID, R1.MF_DOC_ID, R1.CG_NO FROM TMT_RORO_MST R1 WHERE R1.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND (R1.IN_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R1.IN_DTM <> '') AND (R1.OUT_DTM IS NOT NULL AND R1.OUT_DTM <> '') AND (R1.LOADING_DTM IS NULL OR R1.LOADING_DTM = '') AND R1.CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV', 'RMC', 'RMA') GROUP BY R1.VSL_CALL_ID, R1.MF_DOC_ID, R1.CG_NO) RM ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = RM.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = RM.CG_NO WHERE S.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND S.STAT_CD = 'AP' AND R.IX_CD = 'X'
AND R.MF_DOC_ID = #{bookingNo}
AND R.CG_NO = #{shipgNoteNo}
AND R.CHASSIS_NO LIKE CONCAT(#{unitNo}, '%')
AND R.BRAND_CD = #{brandCd}
AND S.CG_TP_CD = #{cgTpCd} AND S.CG_TP_CD IN ('RCV')
ORDER BY R.MF_DOC_ID, R.CG_NO
